Subject: Malware detected
Description: We are getting a malware notification from this EPP file: DeviceHarddiskVolume3Program FilesCoSoSysEndpoint Protectori386Wow64ProcHelper.exe hash: d0610cf543b5779ec42b0ce5177305853aa8837b Please confirm this is the correct file from your platform.
What_We_Know__c: The file Wow64ProcHelper.exe from the EPP Client was reported as malware
Next_Steps__c:
The file is the correct one, but it belongs to an older version of the EPP Client.
I asked for a remote session in order to update the EPP Server to the latest version
Solution_Comment__c:
The issue was caused by some old EPP Client files which were detected as malware.
Using the newer EPP Client solved the issue.
